details.title: A Low-Cost LAN Implementation for the Factory
details.abstract: As the factory environment becomes increasingly automated, the need for data organization, data integrity, and data access will be a requirement. A local-area network for the factory is an option capable of solving data requirements. In addition, factory operation complexity can be reduced by centralizing data and developing robust applications; these applications should fulfill data organization, integrity, and access requirements and be an operator's interface to the automated factory.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
